leg.name: Squats
leg.instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, lower your hips back and down until your thighs are parallel to the floor, then stand back up.

leg.name: Lunges
leg.instructions: Step forward with one leg and lower your hips until both knees are at 90 degrees, then push back to the starting position.

leg.name: Step-ups
leg.instructions: Step onto a raised surface with one foot, driving through your heel to lift your body, then step back down and repeat on the other side.

leg.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
leg.instructions: Place one foot behind you on a bench or chair, lower your hips while keeping your front knee over your ankle, then push back up.

leg.name: Glute Bridges
leg.instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor, lift your hips up while squeezing your glutes, and lower back down.

leg.name: Calf Raises
leg.instructions: Stand with your feet hip-width apart, lift your heels off the ground, hold for a second, and lower back down.

leg.name: Wall Sits
leg.instructions: Stand against a wall, slide down until your knees are at 90 degrees, and hold the position for as long as possible.

leg.name: Curtsy Lunges
leg.instructions: Step one leg behind and across your body into a curtsy position, lower down, then return to standing and repeat on the other side.

leg.name: Jump Squats
leg.instructions: Perform a squat, then explode upward into a jump, landing softly and immediately lowering into the next squat.

leg.name: Reverse Lunges
leg.instructions: Step backward with one leg and lower your hips until your front knee is at 90 degrees, then push back to standing.

leg.name: Pistol Squats (Assisted)
leg.instructions: Stand on one leg, lower your body while extending the other leg forward, and return to standing. Use a support if needed.

leg.name: Side Lunges
leg.instructions: Step out to the side, bend the knee of the stepping leg while keeping the other leg straight, then return to standing.

leg.name: Donkey Kicks
leg.instructions: Start on all fours, kick one leg back and up while squeezing your glutes, then lower back down and switch sides.

leg.name: Fire Hydrants
leg.instructions: Start on all fours, lift one leg out to the side while keeping the knee bent, then lower back down and switch sides.

leg.name: Frog Jumps
leg.instructions: Squat down, then jump forward explosively while landing softly, repeating in a continuous motion.

leg.name: Single-Leg Glute Bridges
leg.instructions: Lie on your back with one leg extended, lift your hips by driving through the heel of the bent leg, then lower back down.

leg.name: Skater Hops
leg.instructions: Hop laterally from one foot to the other, landing on the opposite foot while keeping your body low and controlled.

leg.name: Sissy Squats
leg.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lean back slightly while bending your knees and lowering your body, then return to standing.

leg.name: Bear Crawl
leg.instructions: Start on all fours, lift your knees off the ground, and crawl forward using opposite arm and leg movements.

leg.name: Cossack Squats
leg.instructions: Step one foot out to the side, lower your hips into a deep squat on that leg while keeping the other leg extended.
